metadata.title: CVE-2020-10941 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Arm Mbed TLS before 2.16.5 allows attackers to obtain sensitive information(an RSA private key) by measuring cache usage during an import.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10941` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmbedcrypto7 - 2.16.5-1ubuntu1
libmbedtls14 - 2.16.5-1ubuntu1
libmbedx509-1 - 2.16.5-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.5-1ubuntu1').
